spec.name: Mercenary Soldier
spec.subtitle: Master of War
spec.description: If the Marauder is the melee master, and the Bodyguard is the all-around weapons and gear trooper, the Mercenary Soldier is the warfare expert. An adpet of both ranged combat and military tactics, he is a leader of warriors in combat and a deadly combatant himself.

talents.name: Command
talents.description: Add 1 Boost per rank of Command when making Leadership checks. Affected targets add 1 Boost to Discipline checks for next 24 hours.

talents.name: Second Wind
talents.description: Once per encounter, may use Second Wind incidental to heal strain equal to ranks in Second Wind.

talents.name: Point Blank
talents.description: Add 1 damage per rank of Point Blank to damage of one hit of successful attack while using Ranged (Heavy) or Ranged (Light) skills at close range or engaged

talents.name: Side Step
talents.description: Once per round, may perform Side Step maneuver and suffer a number of strain no greater than ranks in Side Step, then upgrade difficulty of all incoming ranged attacks by that number for the next round.

talents.name: Confidence
talents.description: May decrease difficulty of Discipline checks to avoid fear by 1 per rank of Confidence.

talents.name: Strong Arm
talents.description: Treat thrown weapons as if they had 1 greater range.

talents.name: Point Blank
talents.description: Add 1 damage per rank of Point Blank to damage of one hit of successful attack while using Ranged (Heavy) or Ranged (Light) skills at close range or engaged

talents.name: Field Commander
talents.description: Take the Field Commander action: make an Average Leadership check. A Number of allies equal to Presence may immediately suffer 1 strain to perform 1 free maneuver.

talents.name: Command

talents.name: Natural Marksman
talents.description: Once per session, may re-roll any 1 Ranged (Light) or Ranged (Heavy) check.

talents.name: Sniper Shot
talents.description: Before making a non-thrown ranged attack, may perform a Sniper Shot maneuver to increase the weapon's range by 1 range band per rank in Sniper Shot. Upgrade the difficulty of the attack by 1 per range band increase

talents.name: Improved Field Commander
talents.description: Field Commander action affects allies equal to double Presence, and may spend 1 Triumph to allow allies to suffer 1 strain and perform 1 free action instead.

talents.name: Grit
talents.description: Gain +1 Strain Threshold

talents.name: Toughened
talents.description: Gain +2 Wound Threshold

talents.name: Lethal Blows
talents.description: Add +10 per rank of Lethal Blows to any Critical Injury results inflicted on opponents

talents.name: Deadly Accuracy
talents.description: When acquired, choose 1 combat skill. Add damage equal to ranks in that skill to one hit of successful attacks made using that skill

talents.name: True Aim
talents.description: Once per round, may perform a True Aim maneuver to gain benefits of aiming and upgrade combat check once per rank of True Aim.

talents.name: Dedication
talents.description: Gain +1 to a single characteristic. This cannot bring a characteristic above 6
